rukus.text: jyare suraja lapeti devamam avase
ane jyare tara'o prakasahina tha'i jase
ane jyare parvato calavavamam avase
ane jyare dasa mahinani garbhavali untanine chodi devamam avase
ane jyare jangali janavara bhega karavamam avase
ane jyare dariya'o bhadakavavamam avase
ane jyare atma'o (sariro sathe) jodi devamam avase
ane jyare jivati dateli balakine savala karavamam avase
ke kaya aparadhana karane mari nakhavamam avi
ane jyare karmanondha kholi nakhavamam avase
ane jyare akasani khala khenci levamam avase
ane jyare jahannama bhadakavavamam avase
ane jyare jannata najika lavavamam avase
pratyeka vyakti jani lese je te la'ine avyo che
hum sogandha kha'u chum pachala hatavavala
calanara ane santa'i janara tara'o ni
ane ratani jyare samapta thava lage che
Ane savarani jyare camakava lage
ni:Sanka a eka ijhajhatavala pharista'o ni laveli vani che
je saktisali che. Arsavala (allaha) ne tyam ucca sthanavalo che
jeni vata manavamam ave che. Pramanika che
ane tamara sathi pagala nathi
tene tene (jibra'ila) akasona khulla kinare joya pana che
ane te chupi vato batavavamam kanjusa pana nathi
ane a kura'ana dhikkarela sayatananum kathana nathi
pachi tame kyam ja'i rahya cho
a jagata vasi'o mate eka smrtibodha che
(khasa karine) temana mate je sidho marga apanavava mage che
ane tame nathi icchi sakata jyam sudhi samraga srstino palanahara nathi icchato
